description: NOTE: This kit is compatible with 58MM lenses only. Not all Canon cameras come with 58MM lenses. Please verify your camera's lens thread sizebeforeordering. Your camera's lens thread size will be marked somewhere on the lens barrel or printed underneath your lens cap. This number is always preceded by a "" (diameter) symbol. For example: 58 = 58mm lens thread size.- 58mm Professional Series Altura Photo 2.2X Telephoto Lens- This telephoto lens attaches to the front of your existing camera lens and is compatible with virtually all cameras, camcorders and lenses with 58mm filter threads.-58mm Professional Series Altura Photo 0.43x Wide Angle Lens with Macro Portion- This wide angle lens attaches to most cameras, camcorders and lenses with 58mm filter threads.- 2-in-1 This wide angle lens features a detachable macro lens for close-up, high detail photography.-58mm Vivitar Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD)- Set of 3 filters (Ultraviolet, Polarizer and Fluorescent) in a compact protective carry pouch.-58mm Vivitar Macro Close-Up Filter Kit (+1,+2,+4,+10)- Set of 4 Vivitar filters of increasing magnification for high detail, close-up macro photography. Protective filter carry pouch included.-58mm Collapsible Rubber Lens Hood- 3-in-1 Collapsible design: Extend to full length for use with a telephoto lens, midway for wide angle shots, or completely for macro photography or easy and compact storage.- Double threaded screw mount also allows you to attach lens caps, filters, or other accessories on the hood itself.-58mm Snap-On Lens Cap- Generic lens cleaning pen-Premium MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth- Size: 6 x 7 inches (15cm x 18cm)
title: 58MM Starter Accessory Kit for CANON EOS REBEL (T5i T4i T3i T3 T2i T1i XT XTi XSi SL1) - Includes: Altura Photo 0.43x Wide Angle & Altura Photo 2.2x Telephoto High Definition Lenses + Vivitar Filter Kit (UV, CPL, FLD) + Vivitar Macro Close-Up Set + Collapsible Lens Hood + Snap On Lens Cap + Lens Cleaning Pen + MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
